title: Sweet + Salty Sauce
directions: Melt butter. Add brown sugar and vanilla. Mix.
In a large bowl, add Chex, pretzels, and Bugles. Pour sauce over cereal mixture and toss until coated.
Line two large baking sheets with parchment paper. Bake for 45 min, stirring every 15 min.
Remove and cool. Add to the large bowl along with the candy corn. Toss.
